attributes.action: Stop the wasteful talk of commissioning a new royal yacht.
attributes.additional_details: At a time when money is tight and the navy is under pressure. As we cut foreign aid. We go wasting money on this vanity project.
attributes.background:
We have no need for a royal yacht.
We also no longer have a navy that can readily protect it.
Stop this tub thumping vanity project of the prime minister.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584822
